author: chris-dollin
msg: The OntDocumentManager now uses the model's spec's ModelGetter to get the
import models. (And the default ModelGetter will defer back to the ModelMaker,
so the existing behaviour is preserved.)

author: chris-dollin
msg: OntModelSpec will fabricate a ModelGetter on demand. OntDocumentManager has
been tweaked to isolate the use of the ModelMaker so we can replace it with

author: chris-dollin
msg: ModelGetter acquired an extra method, which meant various changes
where that interface is implemented - typically the new method just
throws an exception. Since no-one ever calls it [yet] (because it's new ...)
